text: Tanvir Mokammel (born 8 March 1955) is a Bangladeshi filmmaker and writer. He received the Ekushey Padak in 2017. He has won the Bangladesh National Film Awards total ten times for the films Nodir Naam Modhumoti (1995), Chitra Nodir Pare (1999) and Lalsalu (2001). He directs the Bangladesh Film Institute in Dhaka. == References == Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Bangladeshi writers Category:People from Khulna Division
title: Tanvir Mokammel
